greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Sum of elements of the multiset spanning an initial interval of positive integers with multiplicities equal to the prime indices of n in weakly decreasing order.
example: The multiset spanning an initial interval of positive integers with multiplicities equal to the prime indices of 90 in weakly decreasing order is {1,1,1,2,2,3,3,4}, so a(90) = 1+1+1+2+2+3+3+4 = 17.
results.author: _Gus Wiseman_, Aug 23 2018
